name: Dinari SPWO
description: The Dinari SPWO dShares token (SPWO.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the SP Funds S&P World (ex-US) ETF (NYSE Arca: SPWO). This ETF is designed to provide exposure to global equities outside the United States that comply with Shariah principles, focusing on firms with robust financial health and low leverage. Each SPWO.d token is fully backed by a corresponding SPWO ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, SPWO.d offers investors access to a diversified portfolio of Shariah-compliant international stocks, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
